metadata.title: CVE-2024-57360 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: https://www.gnu.org/software/binutils/ nm >=2.43 is affected by: IncorrectAccess Control. The type of exploitation is: local. The component is: `nm--without-symbol-version` function.

criterions.comment: binutils package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
